channel.title: General Linux Osx Ubuntu Unix Desktop Linux on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Linux Osx Ubuntu Unix Desktop Linux on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Desktop Linux....
item.description: I am a linux mad man recently. I was noticing today that almost all of my devices i enjoy using are unix and mostly linux based. Pretty insane. So with that thought i decided to unshackle myself from the man and attempt desktop linux for the first time. I am scared. Hold me! I am currently installing Ubuntu on my laptop. 7.04 didn’t boot on this guy - but 7.10 rocks pretty hard.
